root: ^The faint sound of trickling water leads you to an ancient stone well. The air around it hums with the energy of forgotten wishes.

c-0: ^You toss 20 gold into the darkness. A moment later, a [Silver Ring] magically rises from the water's surface! (-20 Gold, Got [Silver Ring])
c-1: ^The cool, sweet water soothes your throat and clears your mind. (Restore 25% HP)

INT_Check_Success: ^You focus your gaze, piercing the gloom. You spot a small leather pouch wedged in the stones just below the water line. (+100 Gold)
INT_Check_Fail: ^You lean too far over the edge, lose your balance, and bump your head on the stone rim. (-10 HP)
